thread.section_title: CashForCars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CashForCars.com | cashforcars.com
thread.title: Charles

author: Charles
title: Charles
text: I have never in my 40 yrs seen a company go that far out of their way to satisfy a customer. I was unhappy with my experience at first but, Mr Sutkins went out of his way to make my experience great. He truly did more than he should of and then some. I truly do not ever believe that any other company would even come close to the customer satisfaction I recieved. I recommend this company to anyone and everyone simply based on customer satisfaction.
